title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for approximation

1 point is earned for conclusion with explanation

f (1.1) ≈ 2.8

Since y = f (x) >0 on the interval 1 ≤ x < 1.1 , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaGymaiabgs MiJkaadIhacqGH8aapcaaIXaGaaiOlaiaaigdacaGGSaaaaa@3D3F@

d 2 y d x 2 = y 3 ( 1+3 x 2 y 2 )>0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaSaaaeaaca WGKbWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaOGaamyEaaqaaiaadsgacaWG4bWa aWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaaaakiabg2da9iaadMhadaahaaWcbeqaai aaiodaaaGcdaqadaqaaiaaigdacqGHRaWkcaaIZaGaamiEamaaCaaa leqabaGaaGOmaaaakiaadMhadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaaakiaawI cacaGLPaaacaqG+aGaaeimaaaa@47E9@ on this interval.

Therefore on the interval 1< x <1.1, the line tangent to the graph of y = f (x) at x =1 lies below the curve and the approximation 2.8 is less than f (1.1)
